Synopsis: Retrieves SMB server configuration details for a specified computer.
Description: This function retrieves the SMB server configuration details for a specified computer.
Notes: This function requires administrative privileges to retrieve SMB server configuration details.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerSMB -ComputerName "Server01"
Retrieves the SMB server configuration details for the computer named "Server01".
